welcome_message_body: Welcome to Trieste, a city known for its charming blend of Italian, Austrian, and Slovenian influences, stunning architecture, and vibrant coffee culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer. Buon viaggio!

restaurants.name: Genuino
restaurants.description: Genuino is a fast food restaurant located in Trieste.
restaurants.address: Via delle Beccherie 13, 34121 Trieste Friuli Venezia Giulia
